ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He saw him on the clear horizon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He had surely seen Him on the clear horizon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: he indeed saw the message-bearer on the clear horizon;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He certainly saw him (Gabriel) high up on the horizon in his original form
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed he saw him on the clear horizon. (Prophet Mohammed saw Angel Jibreel in his true shape – peace and blessings be upon them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed he saw him in the clear horizon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And of a truth he saw himself on the clear horizon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: he truly saw him on the clear horizon;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Surely he beheld Him on the clear horizon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: he truly beheld him [the angel] on the clear horizon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Assuredly he beheld him in the horizon manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: certainly he saw him on the manifest horizon,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And without doubt he saw him in the clear horizon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed he (Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) saw him [Jibrael (Gabriel)] in the clear horizon (towards the east).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: in truth he saw him (Gabriel) on the clear horizon,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He saw him on the luminous horizon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [81:23] For verily he, Muhammad (s), saw him, Gabriel, in the form in which he was created, on the clear horizon, the highest one, towards the east;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Surely he beheld him) Muhammad saw Gabriel (on the clear horizon) on the high setting of the sun.
